feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.2
entry.content:
• Fixed .ico favorite icon for huntarr in Firefox (User Request - .ezek1el3000). Took me hours to add j/k

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.6.1...6.6.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.3
entry.content:
• Changed wording of General Settings to just settings to take up less space
  • (Mobile View) Fixed Apps header
  • (Mobile View) Settings and the save button only take up one line of space

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Now deploys installers for MAC (ARM/Intel) - Look Below!
  • Warning for current Docker users, upgrading to V7 WILL wipe your configs (from v6 prior) due to the rewrite of variable paths over hard-coded paths. If you go back to any v6, your settings will come back.
  • v7 stages huntarr to be installable for Windows and linux OSes in the future (not ready yet)

  • For anyone using Watchtower, this is why I stopped using it in 2015, so you are not surprised. Had plex botch my libraries before from automatic upgrades.

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/456

  • Merge pull request #456 from plexguide/dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/457
  • Merge pull request #457 from plexguide/main by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/458
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/459

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.6.3...7.0.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.1

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Linked settings (i) information icons to the wiki (for noob) users

  • Fixed multiple instance button menu display

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/461

  • chore: bump version from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/462 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.1...7.0.2
